alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:24PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Charles and north central Lafourche Parishes through 800 PM CDT... At 724 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bayou Gauche, or 12 miles south of Hahnville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Larose, Cut Off, Lockport, Mathews, Des Allemands, Bayou Gauche and Raceland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
